title-group.article-title: EVALUATING WHITTAKER FUNCTIONS AND MAASS FORMS FOR SL(3,ℤ)

abstract.p: We present and compare several algorithms for evaluating Jacquet's Whittaker functions for SL(3,ℤ). The most suitable algorithm is then applied to the problem of evaluating a Maass form for SL(3,ℤ) with known eigenvalues and Fourier coefficients.
